overview: Abhi (Sushanth) is a young bloke who provides a unique service - that of creating rifts between couples. He provides this service mostly to the couplesâ€™ parents. He builds crevices between lovebirds who plan to marry against the wishes of their parents and gets paid big bucks for his services. But when he wants to, he also helps those in love and even helps them get married.
title: Adda
